song_lyrics: Āj me to dīṭhā re Albelo āvtā re lol,
Sundar moḷīḍu re shobhe shir upare re lol,
Fūlḍā nā torā re khosyā bāī khupmā re lol,
Gajrā bāndhyā chhe beu hāth re... 2
Fūlḍāṇā hār re hīnche ghaṇu haīḍe re lol,
Nakhshikh shobhe chhe ghaṇu Nāth re... 3
Laṭkantā āve re levā man māhru re lol,
Joī joī mohī rahyu māru chitt re... 4
Shu karū sāhelī re ghelī thaī (hu) faru re lol,
Haiyu to rahyu nahi māre hāth re... 5
Rasbas thaī re bāī enā rūpmā re lol,
title: Āj me to dīṭhā re Albelo āvtā re lol

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-7: Sadguru Nishkulanand Swami

Category: Shri Harina Pad
